entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:33 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
